content: <color=#4cb4b0>Left-click on the big tree</color> to shake it, and <color=#4cb4b0>branches will fall down. Just collect five of them</color>.
Pardon me. It's a pleasure to meet you. I am Ziya.
I have a small favor to ask - would you mind helping me find <color=#4cb4b0>five branches</color>? I'd like to make a temporary fishing rod stand.
I need to stay here and repair this fishing rod with some string.
I'm going to roll the gacha
How embarrassing... I was so startled when I saw you that I yanked my fishing rod too hard and cracked this old thing. I suppose I'm still not as composed as I should be...
No worries, you learn something new every day!

There's a trick to it! For instance, when the sediment layer at the bottom is thick, the bait tends to sink too deep, making it hard for fish to spot it. That's why using thin hooks and lighter bait works better... My apologies, I tend to ramble on when it comes to fishing.
Shhhhâ€”What?! A new friend is here?!!! Ah, the fish got away... My rod is ruined!!!
